page.title: 08ATTITUDES
page.content: My name is Sharon. I am English and I have recently moved up to Scotland as my father has been promoted. I had thought a lot about coming here as I'd never lived in Scotland before. I had to leave all my friends and relations behind. Life was'nt easy as the boys and girls teased me. In England we just don't do that! We have homework in Scotland but not in England, partly because we had time to do all of our work in school. On Mondays we had country dancing. Here we only have it at Christmas. On Tuesdays we had ordinary dancing. We don't have it here.On Wednesday we had games,on Thursday we had gym. In Scotland we stop earlier for thesummer holidays. There is only one age group in my new class but in England we had composite classes. I am slowly settling down.
